Name: ​Sandward​ - Blade
Description: A close-range weapon, a defensive expert with considerable damage. The sword's momentum is overwhelming and unstoppable. Its broad blade not only provides a rock-solid sense of stability but also gathers the power of rock and sand to unleash astonishing destructive force.
Description$english: A close-range weapon, a defensive expert with considerable damage. The sword's momentum is overwhelming and unstoppable. Its broad blade not only provides a rock-solid sense of stability but also gathers the power of rock and sand to unleash astonishing destructive force.
